product: Xiaomi Redmi Note 11 4G 64 GB (Horizon Blue, 4 GB RAM)
details: Enjoy technologically advanced features and functions on the Xiaomi Redmi Note 11 4G 64 GB (Horizon Blue, 4 GB RAM) as it is equipped with useful specifications. Available in Horizon Blue, the mobile has eye-catching looks. Moreover, the dimensions of the phone measure 159.87 mmx73.87mmx8.09 mm (height x width x thickness) and weigh approximately 179 grams thus offering a slip-free grip.

product: Samsung Galaxy A22 5G 128 GB (Gray, 8 GB RAM)
details: The mobile comes with a 6.6 inches (16.76 cm) screen that has a resolution of 1080 x 2400 Pixels. With a pixel density of 399 ppi, you will enjoy watching your favorite content on the Samsung Galaxy A22 5G 128 GB (Gray, 8 GB RAM) with utmost clarity. With a pixel density of 399 ppi, Apart from this, dimensions of the smartphone are 167.2 mmx76.4 mmx9 mm (H x W x T), and it weighs about 203 grams.
